
# APCO 
![apco](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/apco/logo.png?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `apco` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] APCO 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  Apco Pay provides highly specialised payment processing solutions for all sectors. We the ability to adjust to market requirements and trends which helped us establish ourselves in the market.      We clients located globally, ApcoPay provides reach into all markets with focused payment options.Apco Limited was founded in 1984 with the aim of providing financial institutions with solutions to automate payments. Over the years, we have developed and supplied various payment solutions in different markets and sectors thus enriching our knowledge around payments and associated processes for the card present and card not present environments.  We are set up in a way to ensure that the company can provide an integrated service which is comprehensive in its approach; be it for the banking and financial sector, the retail sector, a distribution network such as petrol stations or smart cards for the National Student Payment Card.
